newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's Tong Yang Nylon changes name.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's Tong Yang Nylon changes name.

text.p: Tong Yang Nylon Co said on Tuesday it had decided to change its name into Hyosung T&C Co, effective on November 1, to better reflect the identity of its parent.
Tong Yang, the core unit of the diversified Hyosung Group, is one of South Korea's largest nylon yarn producers.
Hyosung Group has 16 member firms engaged in the textiles, foreign trading, telecommunications and chemical sectors, a spokesman for the group said.
The other of the group's two units listed on the Seoul stock market is Hyosung Corp, a foreign trading firm.
